rules.natural: Provided that the research lab has funding from the government, then the research lab receives a grant from the foundation.

If the researcher uses an anemometer, then under the condition that it is not the case that the researcher has a protocol for safety standards or the research lab receives a grant from the foundation, it follows that the equipment does not cause damage due to a storm.

Whenever the researcher uses a pyranometer, then if it is not the case that the researcher has a protocol for safety standards or the research lab receives a grant from the foundation, the equipment does not cause damage due to a storm.
If the researcher measures wind speed, then the researcher uses an anemometer.
The researcher measures wind speed or the researcher measures solar intensity.
Provided that the researcher measures solar intensity, then the researcher uses a pyranometer.
Under the condition that the facility connects to the grid, the facility produces power for the grid.
If the technician is authorized for maintenance, then whenever the research lab does not receive a grant from the foundation, the facility connects to the grid.
Whenever the technician is trained in operations, then the technician is authorized for maintenance.
If the researcher follows the safety protocol, then it is not the case that the researcher violates regulations during testing.
Either the researcher follows the safety protocol or the researcher implements safety procedures.
Provided that the researcher implements safety procedures, then the researcher wears protective gear.
If the researcher wears protective gear, then the researcher secures the site perimeter.
Whenever the regulator imposes a fine on the facility, then the regulator issues a warning for violations.
If the researcher develops skill in wind analysis, then the researcher does not use a fossil generator as a tool.
If the researcher passes the certification exam, then provided that the research lab does not have funding from the government, the researcher develops skill in wind analysis.
Either the researcher completes an advanced course or if the researcher attends training for certification, then the researcher passes the certification exam.
Whenever the researcher has skill in solar design, then the researcher does not use a fossil generator as a tool.
Provided that the technician reports data to the database, then the technician submits a report of findings.
Under the condition that the technician submits a report of findings, the database updates records with measurements.
If the researcher studies solar radiation, then either the researcher operates at a field station or if the researcher performs a test on a solar array, then the researcher has skill in solar design.
The researcher studies solar radiation or the researcher studies wind patterns.

Provided that the researcher studies wind patterns, then the researcher operates at a field station or if the researcher performs a test on a solar array, then the researcher has skill in solar design.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if the supervisor conducts an inspection of the facility, then provided that the researcher secures the site perimeter, the researcher does not violate regulations during testing, then the regulator imposes a fine on the facility.
